weka.dl4j.distribution

Class NormalDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.distribution.Distribution
      • org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.distribution.NormalDistribution
        • weka.dl4j.distribution.NormalDistribution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, OptionHandler

    public class NormalDistribution
extends org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.distribution.NormalDistribution
implements OptionHandler
    A version of DeepLearning4j's NormalDistribution that implements WEKA option handling.
    Version:
    $Revision: 11711 $
    Author:
    Eibe Frank
    See Also:

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NormalDistribution()
      Constructions normal distribution with mean 0 and unit variance.
